rows.name: Professional Experience and Knowledge
cells: At least 1 year of relevant experience desirable but not essential.
At least 2 years of relevant experience.
At least 3 years of relevant experience.
At least 5 years of relevant experience.
At least 7 years of relevant experience.

rows.name: Business Domain Knowledge
cells: Not expected to have knowledge or experience of business administration processes.
Expected to be able to follow a defined business administration process.
Expected to be able to follow and understand a defined business administration process.
Expected to be able to follow, understand, and enhance a defined  business administration process.
Expected to be able to follow, understand, and actively influence and enhance a defined business administration process.

rows.name: Design and Documentation Skills
cells: Able to read and understand process-related documentation; complete tasks according to the team’s rules.
Able to read, understand and design process-related documentation; able to follow guidelines, identify tasks and complete them according to the team’s rules.
Able to read, understand and design high-quality process-related documentation; able to follow guidelines, identify tasks and complete them according to the team’s rules.
Able to read, understand and design high-quality process-related documentation; able to design guidelines, identify (OR set)  tasks and complete them according to the team’s rules.
Able to read, understand and design high-quality process-related documentation; able to design guidelines, set tasks and complete them according to the team’s rules.

rows.name: Organizational Impact/Responsibility and reliability
cells:
Works on limited set of tasks.
Expected to work effectively under supervision. Problem set is well-defined. Plans and executes own work assignments defined by more senior team member. Contributes primarily to own work group. Direct impact on the group work.
Expected to work effectively under supervision and to perform a variety of activities in accordance with the established standards.

Expected to be self-managing, implement functionality without supervision. Able to share learning or enable process improvement. Proactive attitude in identifying issues at the earliest opportunity and in responding to potential problems.

Expected to be self-managing, take responsibility for a projects, work without supervision. Able to share learning or enable process improvement. Proactive attitude in identifying issues at the earliest opportunity and in responding to potential problems.

Expected to be self-managing, take responsibility for a projects, work without supervision. Able to share learning or enable process improvement.Proactive attitude in identifying issues at the earliest opportunity and in responding to potential problems.

rows.name: Quality
cells: No specific expectations regarding quality.
Must show a sense of responsibility for the quality of his / her deliverables.
Creates deliverables in good quality.
Must be a role model for colleagues; creates deliverables in high quality.
Must be a role model for colleagues, on a par with the best industry standards; creates deliverables in excellent-quality.
